description: Monitor executed commands and arguments that may access to a host may attempt to access Local Security Authority (LSA) secrets. Remote access tools may contain built-in features or incorporate existing tools like Mimikatz. PowerShell scripts also exist that contain credential dumping functionality, such as PowerSploit's Invoke-Mimikatz module,(Citation: Powersploit) which may require additional logging features to be configured in the operating system to collect necessary information for analysis. Analytic 1 - Suspicious access to LSA secrets. index=security (sourcetype="Powershell" EventCode=4104) Image="*powershell.exe" CommandLine IN ("*Invoke-Mimikatz*", "*Invoke-LSADump*")
